en: Revives 1 ally with a small amount of HP.
Increases 1 ally's Attack for <tags=''33''g=''1'' type=''Turn'' value=''3''> turns.
Increases 1 ally's Defense for <tags=''33''g=''1'' type=''Turn'' value=''3''> turns.
Increases 1 ally’s Aim/Dodge for <tags=''33''g=''1'' type=''Turn'' value=''3''> turns.
Guarantees the party escape from battles, save for select special encounters.
Repels 1 Physical attack for 1 ally. Can't coexist with a Magic repel effect.
Repels 1 non-Almighty Magic attack for 1 ally. Can't coexist with a Physical repel effect.
Restores a small amount of HP for 1 ally.
Fully heals 1 ally's HP and cures them of all status ailments other than KO.
Restores a small amount of MP for 1 ally.
